name: Luma3DS 3GX Plug-in
summary: A 3GX file is a Luma3DS 3GX (3DS Game eXtension) plug-in used by a Nintendo 3DS handheld gaming console with the Boot9Strap custom firmware loader and Luma3DS program installed. The file contains a plug-in that extends the functionality of a Nintendo 3DS game, such as adding a cheat loader or game mod.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
